languages.text:
The Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks.
The Assassin can move through enemies.
The Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}.
The Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional damage.
All {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency.
-<indent=5%>Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
The Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks.
The Assassin can move through enemies.
The Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}.
The Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional damage.
All {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency.
-<indent=5%>Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.</indent>

languages.text: The Assassin can move through enemies and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. Their attacks deal +10% more damage. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Partial cover{/g} provides the Assassin with 50% cover efficiency.
languages.original_text: Ассасин может проходить сквозь позиции противников и получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}. Его атаки наносят на 10% больше урона. Эффективность {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичных укрытий{/g} для ассасина составляет 50%.

Его атаки наносят на 10% больше урона. Эффективность {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичных укрытий{/g} для ассасина составляет 50%.

traits.locale_text: Ассасин может проходить сквозь позиции противников и получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}. Его атаки наносят на 10% больше урона. Эффективность {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичных укрытий{/g} для ассасина составляет 50%.

Ассасин может проходить сквозь позиции противников и получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}. Его атаки наносят на 10% больше урона. Эффективность {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичных укрытий{/g} для ассасина составляет 50%.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}は敵を通り抜けることができる。それに、アサシンは+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と+{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}に増加する。ダメージが+10%増加する。{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半遮蔽物{/g}内にいる間、遮蔽効率が50%になる。
languages.original_text: The Assassin can move through enemies and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. Their attacks deal +10% more damage. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Partial cover{/g} provides the Assassin with 50% cover efficiency.

languages.text: L'assassin peut passer au travers des ennemis et bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}. Son attaque inflige +10 % de dégâts. La {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture partielle{/g} octroie +50 % d'efficacité de couverture à l'assassin.
languages.original_text: The Assassin can move through enemies and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. Their attacks deal +10% more damage. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Partial cover{/g} provides the Assassin with 50% cover efficiency.

traits.locale_text: L'assassin peut passer au travers des ennemis et bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}. Son attaque inflige +10 % de dégâts. La {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture partielle{/g} octroie +50 % d'efficacité de couverture à l'assassin.

languages.text: El asesino puede atravesar enemigos y gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}. Sus ataques infligen un +10 % más de daño. La {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura parcial{/g} proporciona al asesino un 50 % de eficacia de cobertura.
languages.original_text: The Assassin can move through enemies and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. Their attacks deal +10% more damage. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Partial cover{/g} provides the Assassin with 50% cover efficiency.

traits.locale_text: El asesino puede atravesar enemigos y gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}. Sus ataques infligen un +10 % más de daño. La {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura parcial{/g} proporciona al asesino un 50 % de eficacia de cobertura.

languages.text: 刺客移动时可以穿过敌人，同时{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}%，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}提高{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}%。刺客的攻击造成的伤害提高10%，{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半身掩体{/g}可以为刺客提供50%掩体效率。
languages.original_text: The Assassin can move through enemies and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. Their attacks deal +10% more damage. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Partial cover{/g} provides the Assassin with 50% cover efficiency.

traits.locale_text: 刺客移动时可以穿过敌人，同时{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}%，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}提高{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}%。刺客的攻击造成的伤害提高10%，{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半身掩体{/g}可以为刺客提供50%掩体效率。

languages.text: Suikastçı, düşmanların bulunduğu hücrelerden geçebilir ve +%{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve +%{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} kazanır. Saldırıları +%10 daha fazla hasar verir. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Kısmi siper{/g}, Suikastçı'ya %50 siper etkililiği sağlar.
languages.original_text: The Assassin can move through enemies and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. Their attacks deal +10% more damage. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Partial cover{/g} provides the Assassin with 50% cover efficiency.

traits.locale_text: Suikastçı, düşmanların bulunduğu hücrelerden geçebilir ve +%{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve +%{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} kazanır. Saldırıları +%10 daha fazla hasar verir. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Kısmi siper{/g}, Suikastçı'ya %50 siper etkililiği sağlar.

languages.text: Der Assassine kann sich durch Gegner bewegen und erhält +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g}. Seine Angriffe verursacht +10 % mehr Schaden. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Teilweise Deckung{/g} gewährt dem Assassinen 50 % Deckungseffizienz.
languages.original_text: The Assassin can move through enemies and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. Their attacks deal +10% more damage. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Partial cover{/g} provides the Assassin with 50% cover efficiency.

traits.locale_text: Der Assassine kann sich durch Gegner bewegen und erhält +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g}. Seine Angriffe verursacht +10 % mehr Schaden. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Teilweise Deckung{/g} gewährt dem Assassinen 50 % Deckungseffizienz.
